font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } .header-logo { display: none; } .toolbar-content ion-title>div { opacity: 0; } .page-holy{ background: url(https://cedarstapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/church-bg.png) center/cover; margin-top: 0; } .page-holy .fixed-content{ background:transparent; } .page-holy img{ margin-top: 23vh; } .page-holy p{ color: #c42b39; font-family: 'GothamBook'; margin-left: 3vh; font-size: 7vw; text-align: center; } .page-holy p span{ font-family: 'Gotham-Bold'; font-weight:bold; } .page-holy button{ background: #f3d593; font-family: 'Gotham-Bold'; text-align: center; width: 50vw; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin: 0px auto; padding: 10px; border-radius: 12px; } .page-holy .button-md:hover:not(.disable-hover){ background:#c63643; } .button-md.activated{ background:#c63643; } .page-bible2 iframe{ max-width: 80%; height: auto; min-height: 63vh; margin: 0 auto; display: block; border-radius: 10px; width: 100%; } ion-title{ display:none; } *{ border:none!important; } .ion-page ion-content, .ion-page ion-list .item { color: ; background-color: ; margin-top: -18vh; height: 118vh; } .toolbar-background, .toolbar-background-ios, .custom-page .menu-card { background: transparent; } .fixed-content{ background:black; } .item-md{ padding-left: 0; position: initial; } ion-list-header.item.item-md.list-header.list-header-md{ margin-top:0; background:url(https://cedarstapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/menu-img.png); background-size:cover; background-position:center; } .list-header-md{ min-height: 33.5rem; } .menu-inner .content{ background-color: #000 !important; } ion-content{ background: #040c1d; } .menu-inner ion-list .item{ background:none; border:none; left:0; margin-left:0; text-transform:uppercase; font-family: 'AvenirLT-Black'; } .menu-inner ion-list button.activated .label{ color:#d3352c; } .menu-inner ion-list .item:nth-child(1){ margin-top:0; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } ion-list.list{ margin-top:12vh; } .header-md::after{ dispaly:none !important; } ion-avatar, p.loggedin-msg { display: none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item:nth-child(1)>.item-inner:before{ display:block; content:""; height: 60vh; margin-bottom: 4vh; width:100%; background:url(https://cedarstapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/menu-img.png); background-size: cover; background-position: center; background-repeat:no-repeat; } .menu-inner .content { background:url(http://apphopewell.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/menu-bg.png); background-size: cover; background-position: center; } ion-title{ text-align:center; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: 'GothamBlack'; } .toolbar-background{ border-color:transparent; } .toolbar-content, .toolbar-title, .bar-button-default, .toolbar .bar-button-default:hover, .toolbar .segment-button, .toolbar button.activated, .tabs .tab-button .tab-button-icon, .tab-button .tab-button-text, .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] .tab-button-icon, ion-toolbar .button, .toolbar input.searchbar-input { color:white; } .label { text-align: left; font-family: 'GothamBook'; font-size: 18px; letter-spacing:2px; margin: 13px 8px 13px 15px; } ion-list.list { margin-top: 0vh; display: block; padding: 0; list-style-type: none; margin-left:0; } .menu-inner ion-list .item { display: flex; margin: 0 auto; } .toolbar-content:before { width: 110%; content: ""; background-image: url(https://cedarstapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/header-logo.png); height: 40px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center bottom; background-size:contain; z-index: -1; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 8px; margin: auto; color: white; content: ''!important; background-size: contain; /* bottom: 3vh; */ background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; background-position: center; /* vertical-align: middle; */ /* left: 10vw; */ /* position: absolute; */ z-index: -1; } .ion-md-heart:before{ content:none; } .menu-inner ion-list ion-icon { color:#d3352c; position: absolute; font-size: 25px; left:68px; top:4px; } .show-menu .menu-inner > ion-header{ display:none; } .bar-button .button-inner .ion-md-share{ display:none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item, .menu-inner ion-list > .item:last-child, .menu-inner ion-list > .item-wrapper:last-child .item { border-bottom: none; } ion-list button{ border-bottom:none; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item-block .item-inner { margin-left: 0px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: flex-start; padding-right: 0; } .header-md::after, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="top"] > .tabbar::after, .footer-md::before, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="bottom"] > .tabbar::before{ display:none; } button.item.item-block.hidden { display: none; } ion-label{ white-space:normal; } .button-inner{ color:#252525; font-weight:bold; } .button-inner{ color:white; font-weight:bold; } .bar-button ion-icon{ font-size: 3.4rem; } .menu-inner ion-list .item{ margin-left:0; padding-left:0; } .page-bible2{ background: url(https://cedarstapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/church-bg.png) top/cover; } .page-bible2 .fixed-content{ background:transparent; } .ion-md-heart:before { content: "\f308"; } /************************/ /************************/ /************************/
